# Interactive graph
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Rat Sightings in NYC</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
    <style>
        /* CSS styles for the map and tooltips */
        #map {
            width: 960px;
            height: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .tooltip {
            position: absolute;
            text-align: center;
            width: 200px;
            height: auto;
            padding: 10px;
            font: 12px sans-serif;
            background: lightsteelblue;
            border: 0px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            pointer-events: none;
            opacity: 0;
        }
        .filter-container {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .filter-container select {
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div id="map"></div>
    <div class="filter-container">
        <label for="year-filter">Year:</label>
        <select id="year-filter">
            <option value="">Select Year</option>
            <!-- Year options will be populated here -->
        </select>
        <label for="borough-filter">Borough:</label>
        <select id="borough-filter">
            <option value="">Select Borough</option>
            <!-- Borough options will be populated here -->
        </select>
        <label for="building-type-filter">Building Type:</label>
        <select id="building-type-filter">
            <option value="">Select Building Type</option>
            <!-- Building type options will be populated here -->
        </select>
    </div>
    <script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
